1.title: Michael Peña
1.plot: Actor Michael Peña returns to Mexico to learn more about the country that his parents left behind. Join him as he meets some of his fellow actors from south of the border and performs with some of Mexico's up and coming indie bands.

2.title: Anthony Lamas
2.plot: Chef Anthony Lamas' approach to cuisine combines a great love of food and a deep connection to family heritage. Join him as he travels back home to Mexico explore his mother's roots and discover the culinary secrets of the town of Oaxaca.

3.title: Robert Rodriguez
3.plot: Award-winning film director Robert Rodriguez travels to Morelia to reconnect with the country that gave birth to his first film ever, "El Mariachi".

4.title: Alisa Valdes
4.plot: Author Alisa Valdes travels to Havana, Cuba to visit the place where her father was born and raised. Join her on her journey as she discovers the challenges of living as an author and artist in Communist Cuba.

5.title: Vincent Valdez
5.plot: Born and raised in San Antonio, Texas, Vincent Valdez grew up without knowing Spanish. Travel to Mexico City and watch as the working artist gets schooled by some of the city's most prolific artists.

6.title: Marisol "La Marisoul" Hernandez
6.plot: Join La Marisoul, lead singer and founding member of Grammy-winning band La Santa Cecilia, as she travels to Mexico and takes a closer look at where her parents grew up.

7.title: Genaro Molina
7.plot: Join award-winning photojournalist, Genaro Molina, as he travels to Mexico to take a closer look at his parents' home country.

8.title: Allison Strong
8.plot: Executive Producer Diego Luna and the Fusion Network send singer/songwriter and actress Allison Strong "back home" to her mother's native Colombia.

9.title: Andrew Kennedy
9.plot: Comedian Andrew Kennedy returns to the country he left shortly after birth, Colombia, to explore his roots and even try his hand at standup comedy - in Spanish.

10.title: Nicole Chavez
10.plot: Join stylist to the stars, Nicole Chavez, as she travels back home to Mexico to learn about the amazing fashion and styles of her grandparents' birthplace.

11.title: Mikey Garcia
11.plot: Join world champion boxer Mikey Garcia as he travels back home to Mexico to get a closer glimpse at the country that's given birth to some of the greatest fighters in history.

12.title: Alexis Bledel
12.plot: Join actress Alexis Bledel on an emotional trip back to Buenos Aires, Argentina, her father's birthplace.

imdb.plot outline: From executive producer Diego Luna, Back Home follows a different celebrity guest each week on an intimate and emotional voyage to their family's country of origin. Celebrity guests include Michael Peña, Alexis Bledel, Robert Rodriguez, La Marisoul, Andrew Kennedy, Vincent Valdez, Anthony Lamas, Alisa Valdes, Alison Strong, Mikey Garcia, Genaro Molina and Nicole Chavez.
imdb.title: Back Home
plot: From executive producer Diego Luna, _Back Home_ (qv) follows a different celebrity guest each week on an intimate and emotional voyage to their family's country of origin. Celebrity guests include Michael Peña, Alexis Bledel, Robert Rodriguez, La Marisoul, Andrew Kennedy, Vincent Valdez, Anthony Lamas, Alisa Valdes, Alison Strong, Mikey Garcia, Genaro Molina and Nicole Chavez.
